title: FINAL BONDAGE CAPTIVE: HYPER-REALISTIC HORROR HOTEL
description: "My Boyfriend Rick asked me to 'Just' make a quick stop and drop off a package, no big deal. Then meet up for our Date . . . I didn't know at the time, that package was me! . . .Being taken, bound and hid away was one thing . . . a horrible thing . . . no one knows where you are, or that you're even bound helpless, or if you're still alive or dead? . . . that would be Torture . . . but nothing compared to what's happening to me!I've been taken and bound, but NOT hid away! . . . I'm tied in a skimpy mini skirt and tight tank top, rope embracing my breasts and holding my arms and elbow tightly behind me! . . . I am gagged, unable to speak . . . I am on the hard wood floor, right in the open . . . for hundreds of people to see as they enter and leave my room!WTF is going on??? I'm being held Captive and these people are viewing me like an animal in a Zoo! Why isn't anyone doing anything to help me?!?!?!"As an Addition to My Planned "Hyper-Realistic Horror Hotel", things get a littler Darker then Normal . . . I like to see this Series as part of my 'Zatanna Xtra Dark' Stories. My Goal, with your Approval, is to share more about the Horror Hotel and its un-willing Customers, every few weeks . . ."Love Zatanna . . . Xtra Dark ; ) Contains Scenes of, but not limited to - Prolonged Rope Bondage, BDSM, Distress, Torture, Sensory Deprivation, Water Bondage, Blood, Possible Suffocation . . . Oh, and Hope being given and then ripped away as many times as possible ; )
author: Zatanna Dark
